item.description:
It's the monthly Phoenix Afterhours Party on Sept. 1, 2011.  The usual $5.00 gets you in to fabulous food, great drinks and live music ans tour the Art Museum.  At 8:00 pm is the movie, which is included in the cost.

"Monsoon Wedding" - Bollywood film about a bride and her wedding.  If it is the usual Bollywood film there is plenty of singing and dancing.  Everyone who I've mentioned it to, says they've liked it.  This was postponed from last April or May.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be floating around and downstairs in the Loctite Lobby before the show.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Phoenix After Hours And "Monsoon Wedding"
